inclusion.criterion: haemoglobin (Hb) levels above the Romanian recommended target of 10g/dL and stable
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: treatment with once-weekly SC epoetin beta for at least 2 months prior to enrollment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: immunosuppressive treatment or use of other medication known to influence erythropoiesis 4 weeks before the enrollment
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: participation in another clinical trial 4 weeks prior to enrollment
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: need for blood transfusions within 8 weeks prior to enrollment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: efficient HD (urea-equilibrated Kt/V >1.2, Daugirdas II equation)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: poor blood pressure control (BP ≥140/90mmHg in spite of antihypertensive medication and fluid control by dialysis)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: cardiac failure or hepatic diseases (as defined by abnormal ALT and AST levels) or association of psychical disorders or other disturbances making the enrollment unacceptable, as judged by the physician
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of gastrointestinal bleeding which is an exclusion criterion. However, the overall assessment is likely ineligible due to poor blood pressure control.
